name: Modular Fortress
desc:
As a command flagship, the Cumulonimbus has an unparalleled command system that can easily coordinate the modules with the vast number of aircraft it carries.

Special jump equipment is integrated into the massive engine system, allowing the ship to quickly jump out in case of an emergency, ensuring the survival of this expensive beast.

name: Weak Magnetised Plating
desc:
The Traverser Association's special plating uses the effect of weak magnetisation to deflect the effects of solar storms %s and EMP penetration %s on the ship.

This coating is widely used on the hulls developed by the Traveller's Association.
short: Boosts the hull's resistance to solar storms and EMP.。

name: Nanoclusters
desc:
Greywind is made up of a group of nanobots, so she can do a lot with her many variations.

During surface battles Greywind can join the battlefield to increase the effective strength of %s raiding colonies, while Greywind's extremely powerful AI can provide %s electronic warfare strength to the fleet.

name: Early Warning Radar
desc: The huge detection radar built into the Cloud Penetrator provides the ship with additional %s sensor strength and an increase in electronic warfare power by %s.
short: Improving vision and electronic warfare capabilities力

name: Windward Facing Self-Regulation System
desc: This is a fully automated ship with the Association's special AI Core.

name: Automated Calibration Protocols
desc: By incorporating the Association's standard ship-assist AI system into the ship's existing intelligent control system, it enables more efficient automated AI to perform most of the high-risk and high-fatigue jobs automatically, while still retaining space for key manual operations in case the intelligent AI system is not sufficiently resilient in the event of an unexpected situation on the battlefield - and to ensure that history does not repeat itself. The plug-in significantly reduces  the number of personnel required to operate the ship by %s, and the total crew size, minimising casualties %s. It also improves the speed of engine/weapon repairs.
short: Reduce the ship's manning requirements, reduce the maximum crew size and speed up the maintenance of the ship's systems

name: Integrated Propulsion System
desc: Provides a maximum combat speed of (%s/%s/%s/%s) depending on the size of the ship and decreases as the flux increases, and provides a manoeuvrability bonus of up to {%s} when the ship's flux is above {%s}, which increases as the flux level increases.

name: Advanced Aviation Equipment
desc: Increases the combat radius by %s and the energy/ballistic weapon damage of the ship's aircraft by {%s}, as well as decreasing fighter replacement rate reduction by %s and increasing the rate of recovery of fighter replacement rate by %s.
short: Increasing the replacement rate of fighters, increasing their combat range and weapon damage

name: Aeronautical Integration
desc: Reduces the number of ordnance points required for all fighter wings by %s points.
short: Reduced ordnance points for strikecraft wings

name: Sky Dome System
desc: A complete system including nano hangars, teleporters, etc., which allows fully automated production and deployment of unmanned turrets, is the most central module of the Dome class.。

name: [Sky Dome] Counter Agreement
desc: Adjust (Sky Dome) deployed turrets to attack mode.
short: Adjusting Sky Dome turrets to attack mode

name: Integrated Salvage Cranes
desc: Increases the resources salvaged from derelicts, ship wrecks, etc. by {%s}, affecting only the recovery of common resources such as fuel and supplies, while rare materials such as blueprints will be unaffected. Also improves  post-battle salvage efficiency by {%s}.

name: Glow Control Energy System
desc:
A built-in system of the Synthlight.

This system was severely damaged during Operation White Witch, before which it was named the "Glow Tube Overload System", whose main function was to converge all available energy into the weapon system during combat.

The ship underwent a complete private refurbishment and renovation after being placed under the Traversers' Association.
short: Provides different gains depending on flux state

name: Pansy
desc: Pansy dissipates 150 soft flux per trigger, and if soft flux is maxed out, additional hard flux is dissipated at a ratio of 3:1

name: Anemometer Emergency Reconfiguration System
desc: Developed as part of the 'Vixen' program, this device can be utilized to save ships during critical situations. This emergency repair protocol can be activated by pressing the "L" key, which instantly restarts all engines, giving the ship %s shield damage reduction and very high shield deployment/turning rate for the next five seconds if the ship has shields, and armour resistance for the next five seconds if the ship does not have shields.
